SELECT t4.taskkey,t4.tasktype,t4.typename,t4.businesskey,t4.statisticdate,t4.dskey,t4.granularity,t4.organkey,t4.begintime,t4.endtime,t4.usetime,t4.calstatus, t4.iserror,t5.taskkey AS iscall FROM (SELECT t3.*,t2.taskkey AS iserror FROM (SELECT t.*,t1.TYPENAME from t18_task_fact t,t18_task_type t1 where t.tasktype = t1.tasktype
t.statisticdate >= #statisticdate_begin#
#statisticdate_end# >=t.statisticdate
) t3 LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT TASKKEY FROM T18_errorlog) t2 ON t3.TASKKEY = t2.taskkey) t4 LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT TASKKEY FROM T18_callog) t5 ON t4.TASKKEY = t5.TASKKEY
t4.taskkey = #taskkey#
t4.tasktype = #tasktype#
t4.businesskey = #businesskey#
t4.dskey = #dskey#
t4.granularity = #granularity#
t4.calstatus = #calstatus#
t4.statisticdate >= #statisticdate_begin#
#statisticdate_end# >=t4.statisticdate
order by t4.statisticdate desc,t4.granularity,t4.calstatus,t4.businesskey

select count(*) from t18_task_fact
taskkey = #taskkey#
tasktype = #tasktype#
businesskey = #businesskey#
dskey = #dskey#
granularity = #granularity#
calstatus = #calstatus#
statisticdate >= #statisticdate_begin#
#statisticdate_end# >= statisticdate

select t.taskkey,t1.typename,t.businesskey,t.statisticdate,d.dsname,t.granularity,t.organkey,t.begintime,t.endtime,t.usetime,t.calstatus from T18_task_fact t,t18_datasource d ,t18_task_type t1 where taskkey=#value# and t.dskey = d.dskey and t.tasktype = t1.tasktype
select t.taskkey,t.statisticdate,t.usetime from T18_task_fact t where businesskey=#businesskey# and tasktype=#tasktype# and #statisticdate# > statisticdate order by t.statisticdate desc
update T18_task_fact c set c.calstatus='5' where exists (select 'x' from T18_task_fact b where b.o_businesskey=c.o_businesskey and b.statisticdate=c.statisticdate and b.taskkey = #taskkey#)
